Class StorageHelper

java.lang.Object
adris.altoclef.util.helpers.StorageHelper
public class StorageHelper extends Object

      AVOID using this unless it's the end goal to keep an item in our inventory.
      Returns:
      whether EVERY item target in targetsToMeet is strictly in our inventory.

    • getFilledInventorySlotInaccessibleToContainer

      public static Optional<Slot> getFilledInventorySlotInaccessibleToContainer​(AltoClef mod, ItemTarget withItem)
      There are slots in our inventory that can't be accessed by containers Mainly the crafting + armor + shield slot.
      Returns:
      A slot of withItem that is inaccessible to open containers, or Optional.empty if there are none.
